title: Charging - order of steps to make sphere negative

content.description: A student has a positively charged insulating cube and a neutral conducting sphere. The student can experiment by performing any of the following actions.
content.question: Touch the cube to the sphere.Bring the cube near, but not touching, the sphere.Move the cube away from the sphere.Connect the sphere to ground.Disconnect the sphere from ground.Which actions, and in what order, could the student perform so that the sphere becomes negatively charged?
